title: Universe/Frames/PointIpf
description: Configuration for PointIpf points in frames plugin

mapping.description: Custom mapping to be used to define the point names of the IPF centres. This can be used to overwrite the selection in the IPF file header (i.e. 0 for OratosLegacy or 1 for NAIF) or to provide the required custom mapping in case the selection in the IPF file header is 2 (custom).
mapping.default: OratosLegacy or NAIF automatically used if IPF header selection is 0 or 1 (if not, the mapping becomes mandatory).

axesMapping.description: Custom mapping to be used to define the axes names of the IPF reference axes.
axesMapping.default: code 0 for ICRF and code 4 for ITRF

interpOrder.description: Optional interpolation order for the IPF. If not given, hard coded InterpolationDefaults are used.
